about.description_1: Law Consultation "Argus" of the St. Petersburg City Bar Association was established in 1999 and is one of the oldest consultations within the St. Petersburg Bar Chamber.
about.description_2: The defense of clients by our law consultation attorneys is built upon the unwavering qualities of the 'all-seeing' Argus – justice, vigilance, and devotion.
about.description_3: Our legal expertise covers civil, corporate, and investment law. We also provide legal assistance in conducting complex litigation and arbitration cases.
about.principle_1_text: It is fair that no one should become richer from another's harm 'Aequum est cum alterius detrimento fieri'
about.principle_2_text: our priority is the interests of our clients
about.principle_3_text: attention to detail, not missing the important
about.director_title: Head of LC "Argus", St. Petersburg City Bar Association, Lawyer, Candidate of Legal Sciences

practices.title: OUR PRACTICES
practices.card_1_text: Complex disputes in various areas of law – corporate disputes, bankruptcy cases, inheritance matters, breach of contractual obligations, tort claims, recovery of damages, cases involving foreign parties, and others.
practices.card_2_text: Development of corporate structure based on client objectives; improvement of corporate structure and governance; resolution of corporate disputes and conflicts. Creation and liquidation of corporations.
practices.card_3_text: Services for structuring and supporting real estate transactions, including judicial and pre-trial support of disputes arising from lease relations, establishment of easements and other contracts related to real estate.
practices.card_4_text: Assistance in registration of inheritance rights in Russia for Russian and foreign citizens, as well as inheritance rights in foreign countries with participation of Russian citizens and foreign nationals.
practices.card_5_text: Legal support for investment projects, including those involving digital financial assets. Development and preparation of investment agreements. Development of mechanisms to protect property and owners' rights. Challenging actions of tax authorities.
practices.card_6_text: Support of client interests in bankruptcy proceedings on behalf of the debtor, debtor's counterparties, creditors, and persons controlling the debtor. Litigation regarding subsidiary liability.
practices.card_7_text: Argus shares its knowledge and experience to restore justice and provide legal support to individuals as well as significant social and cultural projects.
